name: THE ROOT DOMINATION
description:
Fungi have been able to communicate in their own language, creating links and being able to communicate with other species. In a world that has lost these connections and is becoming more hostile every day, it is the fungi, these small immobile beings that have decided to create a change, which at first can be seen as villains willing to control everything around them. , the mission of these beings is to create empathy for all the beings they control, making the animals more aware of the other beings that surround them and how their aggressiveness affects them, thus restoring the links of all the species that were lost. with the passage of time, until reaching its goal, the human being.


The root nomination is a platform game, in which the fungus infects other living beings in order to connect them. Your objective as a fungus will be to remain in the body of the living being that you invade and manage to advance despite the change of inputs.

Be careful and attentive to use the correct input to advance and not fall.

  • Manage to get the rabbit to the end of the map without disconnecting from you.
  • Be careful with the crystals.
  • Change iputs when the screen tells you to.
  • Jump to reach the moving platforms, just be careful not to fall.

Download the game from the ZIP file and run it.

Software:

- Unreal

-Photoshop

-Proceate

-Blender

GDD
